name: Fire Risk
description:
As a flame elemental you must reach the bottom of the level.  All the ice platforms are unstable and will melt away as soon as you touch them because you are made of fire.  Your health is also unstable and will deplete every second.  Collect fire orbs to replenish your health so you will last longer.

You are awarded 100 points for each ice block you melt, 300 points for each gem you collect and 5000 points for reaching the bottom of the level as a completion bonus.  The higher your score means the better your grade at the end.

Created for Ludum Dare 49 (Theme:  Unstable)
